_source.productName: Sirromet Winery - Collectormania Antique, Collectable and Record Fair
_source.productDescription:
Join in at the Sirromet Winery -  Antique, Collectable and Record Fair. This premium event will be held at the award winning Sirromet Winery in their Lurleen's and Barrel Hall event spaces. It will be a luxury treasure trove, filled with vendors selling items like; high end porcelain, gold / silver antique jewellery, vintage fashion and accessories, coloured and uranium glassware, military collectables, man cave and shed items, Japanese and Chinese antiques, Jade items, collectable and rare books, old toys, coins and banknotes, pottery, vinyl records, retro and vintage pieces and much more.

This event is fully indoors and air conditioned with a lovely onsite cafe 'Cellar Door'. They will have a bar open in the fair hall to grab yourself a glass of bubbly while you browse. There will also be an ATM available for your convenience. You will have the opportunity to win AUD100 VISA gift card with our lucky door prize!

_source.productDescription:
Dive into great tunes and tasty vino at Jazz and Shiraz Albany Creek. Prepare for a relaxing evening at Lemke Park, Albany Creek.

This Jazz and Shiraz event offers a delightful experience for anyone that appreciates a chill afternoon filled with quality music and performers. With live local music and a licensed bar, this event is going to be one you won't want to miss.

Unwind on your picnic rug and let the smooth jazz tunes transport you while indulging in a quiet tipple. The licensed bar will serve a selection of premium wines, beers, and beverages to enhance your enjoyment.

Local musicians will grace the stage, providing a soulful soundtrack to accompany your relaxing afternoon. Take in the serene surroundings of Lemke Park, Albany Creek as you savour the melodies and let the music wash over you.

Best of all, entry into Jazz & Shiraz is free. Gather your friends and family for a memorable afternoon in Albany Creek.

*Note as this event has a licensed bar, no BYO alcohol will be permitted.

_source.productDescription:
Building on the natural strengths of the sport, the Australian Volleyball Super League will be a fast and exciting version of the game. 

Comprising of the best players in the country and a format that brings out their skills, engages the fans and creates a connection to the sport. 

With more consequences more often, faster sets and more action, the Super League packages the traditional aspects of the game into a supercharged City versus City national competition played in venues that engage and entertain. Built for audiences at the game and on Broadcast, this adrenaline-fuelled version of the game drives higher leaps, faster action and harder spikes morphing the game into a high-impact, highly competitive and fast-paced version of volleyball. 

City versus City.
 Countries best players. 
Gender-equal Club competition. 
Broadcast rounds. 

The Super League is a city-based licensee model creating consumer engagement within the geographical area. Designed to develop the commercialisation of the sport and appeal specifically to broadcasters.

Aprovechando las fortalezas naturales del deporte, la Superliga Australiana de Voleibol ser una versin rpida y emocionante.

Compuesta por los mejores jugadores del pas y con un formato que potencia sus habilidades, involucra a la aficin y crea una conexin con el deporte.

Con ms consecuencias, ms frecuencia, sets ms rpidos y ms accin, la Superliga integra los aspectos tradicionales del juego en una competicin nacional Ciudad contra Ciudad, intensa y dinmica, que se juega en estadios que atraen y entretienen. Diseada para el pblico en directo y en directo, esta versin llena de adrenalina impulsa saltos ms altos, accin ms rpida y remates ms potentes, transformando el juego en una versin de voleibol de alto impacto, altamente competitiva y de ritmo rpido.

Ciudad contra Ciudad.
Mejores jugadores del pas.
Competicin de clubes con igualdad de gnero.
Rondas de retransmisin.

La Superliga es un modelo de licencia municipal que fomenta la participacin del consumidor dentro de su rea geogrfica. Diseado para impulsar la comercializacin del deporte y atraer especficamente a las emisoras.

Berlandaskan kekuatan alami olahraga ini, Australian Volleyball Super League akan menjadi versi permainan yang cepat dan seru.

Terdiri dari para pemain terbaik di negara ini dan format yang menonjolkan keterampilan mereka, melibatkan penggemar, dan menciptakan koneksi dengan olahraga ini.

Dengan konsekuensi yang lebih sering, set yang lebih cepat, dan aksi yang lebih intens, Super League mengemas aspek-aspek tradisional permainan ini menjadi kompetisi nasional antar kota yang sangat seru, dimainkan di tempat-tempat yang menarik dan menghibur. Dirancang untuk penonton di pertandingan dan siaran langsung, versi permainan yang memacu adrenalin ini mendorong lompatan yang lebih tinggi, aksi yang lebih cepat, dan lonjakan yang lebih keras, mengubah permainan menjadi versi bola voli yang berdampak tinggi, sangat kompetitif, dan bertempo cepat.

Kota lawan Kota.
Pemain terbaik negara.
Kompetisi klub yang setara gender.
Ronde siaran.

Super League adalah model pemegang lisensi berbasis kota yang menciptakan keterlibatan konsumen di wilayah geografis tersebut. Dirancang untuk mengembangkan komersialisasi olahraga ini dan menarik khususnya bagi para penyiar.

Basandosi sui punti di forza naturali di questo sport, l'Australian Volleyball Super League sar una versione veloce ed emozionante del gioco.

Composta dai migliori giocatori del paese e da un format che esalta le loro abilit, coinvolge i tifosi e crea un legame con lo sport.

Con conseguenze pi frequenti, set pi veloci e pi azione, la Super League racchiude gli aspetti tradizionali del gioco in una competizione nazionale Citt contro Citt ad alta tensione, giocata in luoghi coinvolgenti e divertenti. Pensata per il pubblico presente in partita e in diretta, questa versione adrenalinica del gioco prevede salti pi alti, azioni pi rapide e schiacciate pi potenti, trasformando il gioco in una versione ad alto impatto, altamente competitiva e frenetica della pallavolo.

Citt contro Citt.
I migliori giocatori del paese.
Competizione per club con parit di genere.
Giochi trasmessi.

La Super League  un modello di licenza basato sulle citt che crea coinvolgimento dei consumatori all'interno dell'area geografica. Progettato per sviluppare la commercializzazione dello sport e attrarre specificamente le emittenti televisive.

Criada para o pblico presente no jogo e na transmisso, esta verso cheia de adrenalina do jogo proporciona saltos mais altos, ao mais rpida e chutes mais fortes, transformando o jogo em uma verso de vlei de alto impacto, altamente competitiva e em ritmo acelerado.

Die Australian Volleyball Super League baut auf den natrlichen Strken des Sports auf und bietet eine rasante und spannende Version des Spiels.

Die besten Spieler des Landes treten in einem Format an, das ihre Fhigkeiten frdert, die Fans begeistert und eine Verbindung zum Sport schafft.

Mit hufigeren Konsequenzen, schnelleren Stzen und mehr Action vereint die Super League die traditionellen Aspekte des Spiels in einem spannenden nationalen Wettbewerb Stadt gegen Stadt an spannenden und unterhaltsamen Orten. Diese adrenalingeladene Version des Spiels wurde fr das Publikum vor Ort und im Fernsehen entwickelt und bietet hhere Sprnge, schnellere Action und hrtere Schlge. _source.productDescription:
Soak up the creative atmosphere of a working pottery studio and join the studio community of makers. 

Work under the tutorage of Carys to learn the techniques and tricks to creating in clay and to explore the different surface decoration options. 

Creating in clay and surface decoration. Come along and make a marvellous Fairy, Fungi, moon or magical animal mug or candle holder! 

Guests will receive a wheel-thrown base to sculpt onto, carve and decorate. 

Create an artistic handle, such as a peacock, mushroom, fox-tail, moon, wildflower or carve through holes for candle light to flow through... the possibilities are endless. 

Select whether to add a crystal when making the booking. The workshop will run for two hours and is suitable for beginners through to advanced potters. 

The piece will be carefully dried before its first firing then clear glazed and fired in the kiln. 

It will be ready for collection from the studio in 2-3 weeks. 

On the rare occasion any breakages occur during the firing process, repairs will be made to the best of ability. 

However, if the piece is unable to be repaired, guests will be offered the opportunity to remake it or receive a full refund.

Karya tersebut akan dikeringkan dengan hati-hati sebelum pembakaran pertama, kemudian diglasir bening dan dibakar di dalam tungku.

Al reservar, selecciona si deseas aadir un cristal. El taller tiene una duracin de dos horas y es apto tanto para alfareros principiantes como avanzados.

La pieza se secar cuidadosamente antes de su primera coccin, luego se esmaltar y se hornear.

Estar lista para recoger en el taller en 2-3 semanas.

_source.productDescription:
G'day Townsville - a fun-filled day is on its way. 

This October and November, G'day Little Queenslanders is bringing the party to Moreton Bay, Townsville, Redlands Coast, and Cairns. 

These special events are dedicated to celebrating little Queenslanders while connecting families and communities for mornings filled with joy, laughter, and new discoveries. 

G'day Little Queenslanders is coming to Brigadier North Park, Jezzine Barracks for a free community event. Bring along the family and get ready to enjoy: live children's entertainment, food trucks to purchase tasty treats from much-loved local vendors, discover essential government services and learn what's available to support families and connect with the community, a keepsake, personalised certificate to take home on the day for little Queenslanders. 

Families with Little Queenslanders (aged 02) can register to receive a personalised certificate in-person at the Townsville event, officially welcoming their newest addition to the vibrant community. 

For more information and to register for Little Queenslander's certificate, visit the website. G'day Little Queenslanders is proudly presented by the Queensland Government.

Questo ottobre e novembre, G'day Little Queenslanders porter la festa a Moreton Bay, Townsville, Redlands Coast e Cairns.

Questi eventi speciali sono dedicati a celebrare i piccoli abitanti del Queensland, unendo famiglie e comunit per mattine piene di gioia, risate e nuove scoperte.

Acara spesial ini didedikasikan untuk merayakan Little Queenslanders sekaligus menghubungkan keluarga dan komunitas untuk pagi yang penuh dengan kegembiraan, tawa, dan penemuan baru.

Keluarga dengan Little Queenslanders (usia 02) dapat mendaftar untuk menerima sertifikat pribadi secara langsung di acara Townsville, yang secara resmi menyambut anggota baru mereka di komunitas yang dinamis ini.

_source.productDescription:
Froth Sesh event at The Collective Palm Beach Gold Coast. 

Froth Sesh features live music by Sun Haus, Maria Heneghan and Group will present Brazilian samba dancing and capoeira demonstration and VIP Guest Cheyne Horan, a World Class surfing Legend with a long history of achievements. 

Horan was a 4X World Runner-up 1979  1982, won numerous WCT events, taking out a World Masters title from Tom Carroll in 1999. His relationship with Ben Lexcen winner of the 1983 America's Cup led them to produce the Cheyne Horan Winged Keel fin. 

The following year, Cheyne won the 1984 Bells Beach Easter Pro from Tom Carroll using the famous winged keel fin design. Surfboard Empire has generously donated a "Rad Zapper" Surfboard, a design collaboration between Californian shaper Matt Biolos and Horan, drawn as a special raffle prize including a stack of other raffle prizes. 

Brazilian Style Imports will provide complimentary Guarana Antarctica drinks and sweets in the Upstairs Roof top Bar. 

Tickets are online or available at the door unless sold out. 

This sporting cultural event is hosted by Gold Coast World Surfing Reserve Inc., the host of next year's 2026 World Surfing Conservation Conference at Gold Coast Campus Southern Cross University. 

For more info visit the website.

Evento Froth Sesh al The Collective Palm Beach Gold Coast.

Froth Sesh prevede musica dal vivo di Sun Haus, Maria Heneghan e il gruppo presenter una dimostrazione di samba brasiliana e capoeira, con l'ospite VIP Cheyne Horan, una leggenda del surf di livello mondiale con una lunga storia di successi.

Horan  stato quattro volte secondo al campionato mondiale dal 1979 al 1982, ha vinto numerosi eventi WCT, strappando il titolo di campione del mondo a Tom Carroll nel 1999. Il suo rapporto con Ben Lexcen, vincitore dell'America's Cup del 1983, li ha portati a produrre la pinna Winged Keel di Cheyne Horan.

L'anno successivo, Cheyne ha vinto la Bells Beach Easter Pro del 1984, battendo Tom Carroll con il famoso design della pinna Winged Keel. Surfboard Empire ha generosamente donato una tavola da surf "Rad Zapper", frutto della collaborazione tra lo shaper californiano Matt Biolos e Horan, estratta come premio speciale della lotteria, insieme a una serie di altri premi.

Brazilian Style Imports offrir bevande e dolci Guarana Antarctica gratuiti presso l'Upstairs Rooftop Bar.

I biglietti sono disponibili online o all'ingresso, salvo esaurimento.

Questo evento sportivo-culturale  ospitato dalla Gold Coast World Surfing Reserve Inc., che ospiter la World Surfing Conservation Conference del 2026 presso il Gold Coast Campus della Southern Cross University.

Per maggiori informazioni, visita il sito web.

Al ao siguiente, Cheyne gan el Bells Beach Easter Pro de 1984, derrotando a Tom Carroll con el famoso diseo de quilla alada. What is a Recreational Motorcycle Ride Day?

Ride days are exciting fun on track experiences for all riders from first timers through to seasoned track day lovers who prefer riding on a closed race track environment rather than public roads. Our Ride Days are not a race or race practice day, they are aimed squarely at the leisure ride day motorcyclists wanting to have a fun day at the track with their mates and likeminded enthusiasts who wants to test the speed and limits of their motorcycles in a controlled environment without the hazards one gets when riding on public roads.

Family and friends are welcome to come out at no charge to enjoy your ride day with you.

productComments.commentText:
What is a Recreational Motorcycle Ride Day?

Ride days are exciting fun on track experiences for all riders from first timers through to seasoned track day lovers who prefer riding on a closed race track environment rather than public roads. Our Ride Days are not a race or race practice day, they are aimed squarely at the leisure ride day motorcyclists wanting to have a fun day at the track with their mates and likeminded enthusiasts who wants to test the speed and limits of their motorcycles in a controlled environment without the hazards one gets when riding on public roads.

Family and friends are welcome to come out at no charge to enjoy your ride day with you.

Cos' una giornata di guida ricreativa in moto?

Le giornate di guida sono esperienze entusiasmanti e divertenti in pista per tutti i motociclisti, dai principianti agli amanti pi esperti che preferiscono guidare su un circuito chiuso piuttosto che su strade pubbliche. Le nostre giornate di guida non sono una gara o una giornata di prove libere, sono rivolte direttamente ai motociclisti che vogliono trascorrere una giornata divertente in pista con gli amici e agli appassionati che condividono la stessa passione e vogliono testare la velocit e i limiti delle loro moto in un ambiente controllato, senza i pericoli tipici della guida su strade pubbliche.

Familiari e amici sono benvenuti gratuitamente per godersi la giornata di guida con voi.

O que  um Dia de Passeio de Moto Recreativo?

Os dias de passeio so experincias divertidas e emocionantes na pista para todos os motociclistas, desde iniciantes at os amantes experientes de track days que preferem pilotar em um ambiente de pista fechada em vez de vias pblicas. Nossos Dias de Passeio no so uma corrida ou dia de treino de corrida; eles so voltados diretamente para motociclistas que desejam se divertir na pista com seus amigos e entusiastas que desejam testar a velocidade e os limites de suas motocicletas em um ambiente controlado, sem os perigos de pilotar em vias pblicas.

Famlia e amigos so bem-vindos para virem, sem custo algum, para aproveitar seu dia de passeio com voc.

Was ist ein Freizeit-Motorrad-Ausflugstag?

Ausflugstage bieten spannenden Rennstreckenspa fr alle Motorradfahrer, vom Anfnger bis zum erfahrenen Trackday-Liebhaber, die lieber auf abgesperrten Rennstrecken als auf ffentlichen Straen fahren. Unsere Ausflugstage sind keine Rennen oder Renntrainingstage, sondern richten sich an Freizeit-Motorradfahrer, die mit Freunden und Gleichgesinnten einen spaigen Tag auf der Strecke verbringen und die Geschwindigkeit und die Grenzen ihres Motorrads in einer kontrollierten Umgebung ohne die Gefahren auf ffentlichen Straen testen mchten.

Familie und Freunde sind herzlich eingeladen, kostenlos mitzukommen und Ihren Ausflugstag mit Ihnen zu genieen.

Apa itu Hari Bersepeda Motor Rekreasi?

Hari bersepeda motor adalah pengalaman seru di trek balap bagi semua pengendara, mulai dari pemula hingga penggemar berat yang lebih suka berkendara di trek balap tertutup daripada di jalan umum. Hari Bersepeda kami bukanlah hari balapan atau latihan balap, melainkan ditujukan bagi pengendara motor rekreasi yang ingin bersenang-senang di trek bersama teman-teman dan penggemar yang sepemikiran dan ingin menguji kecepatan dan batas kemampuan motor mereka di lingkungan yang terkendali tanpa bahaya yang mungkin terjadi saat berkendara di jalan umum.

Keluarga dan teman dipersilakan datang tanpa dipungut biaya untuk menikmati hari bersepeda Anda bersama.

Qu es un Da de Paseo en Moto Recreativo?

Los das de paseo son experiencias emocionantes y divertidas en la pista para todos los motociclistas, desde principiantes hasta experimentados que prefieren conducir en un circuito cerrado en lugar de en la va pblica. Nuestros Das de Paseo no son solo carreras ni entrenamientos, sino que estn dirigidos a motociclistas que buscan un da divertido en la pista con sus amigos y otros entusiastas que desean probar la velocidad y los lmites de sus motocicletas en un entorno controlado, sin los peligros de la va pblica.

Familiares y amigos pueden venir gratis para disfrutar de su da de paseo.

Qu'est-ce qu'une journe moto loisir?

Les journes moto sont des expriences passionnantes et amusantes sur circuit pour tous les pilotes, des dbutants aux passionns de motos expriments qui prfrent rouler sur un circuit ferm plutt que sur la voie publique. Nos journes moto ne sont pas une course ni une journe d'entranement. Elles s'adressent aux motards amateurs souhaitant passer une journe amusante sur circuit avec leurs amis et aux passionns qui partagent leurs passions et souhaitent tester la vitesse et les limites de leur moto dans un environnement contrl, sans les dangers de la route publique.

Vos proches sont les bienvenus pour profiter gratuitement de votre journe moto avec vous.

_source.productDescription:
Two crazy days of Chilli Fun! 

Discover Hellfire  Alley  - your journey through spice and tantalising flavours from a range of chilli exhibitor stalls and get behind the competitors vying for the crown in three chilli challenges on centre stage.

Live music throughout the day by  the fantastic Sean Mullen on guitar, and a special appearance by Sandra Beynon, vocalist.

Spicy Salsa Fiesta.
Live Entertainment by the South-American band, dance exhibition, dance lessons and just general hot-blooded Latino music for everyone to enjoy.  

Of course the Ballistic Brewing Co will be serving up great beers (and even a chilli beer!) plus they'll serving up some spicy (and ordinary) cocktails throughout the day and night.

Discover Hellfire Alley, and enjoy two more challenges on centre stage.

Fun for the whole famliy with kids catered to as well - animal nursery, kids craft zone.

Did they mention delicious food?  They'll have a range of sweet and savoury food trucks and vendors on site for both days. 

Single or Two Day Passes Available, with or without Fiesta ticket option. 

Brisbane's  hottest ticket is hosted by My Chilli Festival at Ballistic Brewing Co, Salisbury.
_source.productShortDescription: Enjoy a tantalising array of exhibitor stalls and entertainment from chilli fudge to chilli sauce, from beeswax to barbecue relish, from jerky to jumping castles.

Fiesta de Salsa Apimentada.
Animao ao vivo com a banda sul-americana, exibio de dana, aulas de dana e msica latina animada para todos aproveitarem.

 claro que a Ballistic Brewing Co servir timas cervejas (e at uma cerveja com pimenta!), alm de alguns coquetis apimentados (e comuns) durante todo o dia e a noite.

Passes de um ou dois dias disponveis, com ou sem opo de ingresso para a Fiesta.

Due giorni folli di divertimento a base di chili!

Scopri Hellfire Alley: un viaggio tra spezie e sapori stuzzicanti provenienti da una variet di stand di espositori di chili, e sostieni i concorrenti che si contendono la corona in tre sfide a base di chili sul palco centrale.

Musica dal vivo per tutto il giorno con il fantastico Sean Mullen alla chitarra e un'apparizione speciale di Sandra Beynon, cantante.

Fiesta di Salsa Piccante.
Intrattenimento dal vivo con la band sudamericana, esibizione di danza, lezioni di ballo e musica latina scatenata per tutti i gusti.

Ovviamente, la Ballistic Brewing Co servir ottime birre (e persino una birra piccante!), oltre a cocktail piccanti (e non) per tutto il giorno e la notte.

Scopri Hellfire Alley e goditi altre due sfide sul palco centrale.

Divertimento per tutta la famiglia, con anche un'area dedicata ai bambini: un asilo nido con animali e un'area dedicata ai lavoretti creativi.

Avete gi parlato di cibo delizioso? Saranno presenti una variet di food truck e stand gastronomici dolci e salati per entrambe le giornate.

Sono disponibili pass per uno o due giorni, con o senza l'opzione del biglietto Fiesta.

Il biglietto pi gettonato di Brisbane  offerto dal My Chilli Festival presso la Ballistic Brewing Co, a Salisbury.

Dos das locos de diversin con chile!

Descubre Hellfire Alley: un viaje a travs de las especias y los sabores tentadores de una variedad de puestos de exhibicin de chile y nete a los competidores que compiten por la corona en tres desafos de chile en el escenario central.

Msica en vivo durante todo el da a cargo del fantstico Sean Mullen en la guitarra y la participacin especial de Sandra Beynon, vocalista.

Fiesta de salsa picante.
Entretenimiento en vivo con la banda sudamericana, exhibicin de baile, clases de baile y msica latina apasionada para que todos disfruten.

Por supuesto, Ballistic Brewing Co. servir excelentes cervezas (e incluso una cerveza con chile!), adems de ccteles picantes (y comunes) durante todo el da y la noche.

Descubre Hellfire Alley y disfruta de dos desafos ms en el escenario central.

Diversin para toda la familia, incluyendo nios: guardera de animales y zona de manualidades.

Mencionaron la deliciosa comida? Habr una variedad de puestos de comida y puestos de comida dulce y salada durante ambos das.

Hay pases disponibles para uno o dos das, con o sin opcin de entrada para la Fiesta.

El evento ms popular de Brisbane lo organiza el Festival My Chilli en Ballistic Brewing Co, Salisbury.

Zwei verrckte Tage voller Chili-Spa!

Entdeckt die Hellfire Alley  eure Reise durch die Welt der Gewrze und verlockenden Aromen an verschiedenen Chili-Ausstellerstnden. Schaut euch die Teilnehmer an, die in drei Chili-Challenges auf der Bhne um die Krone kmpfen.

Live-Musik den ganzen Tag ber mit dem fantastischen Gitarrenspieler Sean Mullen und einem besonderen Auftritt von Sngerin Sandra Beynon.

Scharfe Salsa-Fiesta.
Live-Unterhaltung der sdamerikanischen Band, Tanzvorfhrung, Tanzkurse und einfach nur heie Latino-Musik fr alle.

Natrlich serviert die Ballistic Brewing Co. tolle Biere (und sogar ein Chili-Bier!) und serviert den ganzen Tag und Abend ber einige scharfe (und lssige) Cocktails.

Entdeckt die Hellfire Alley und erlebt zwei weitere Challenges auf der Bhne.

Spa fr die ganze Familie  auch fr Kinder ist gesorgt: Tierkindergarten, Bastelbereich.

Haben sie schon leckeres Essen erwhnt? An beiden Tagen gibt es eine Auswahl an sen und herzhaften Foodtrucks und Stnden vor Ort.

Tages- oder Zweitageskarten sind erhltlich, mit oder ohne Fiesta-Ticket-Option.

Brisbanes heiestes Event findet beim My Chilli Festival bei der Ballistic Brewing Co. in Salisbury statt.

Dua hari penuh keseruan menikmati cabai!

Temukan Hellfire Alley - perjalanan Anda melalui rempah-rempah dan cita rasa yang menggoda dari berbagai stan pameran cabai dan dukung para pesaing yang bersaing untuk mendapatkan mahkota dalam tiga tantangan cabai di panggung utama.

Musik live sepanjang hari oleh Sean Mullen yang fantastis pada gitar, dan penampilan spesial oleh Sandra Beynon, vokalis.

Spicy Salsa Fiesta.
Hiburan Live oleh band Amerika Selatan, pameran tari, pelajaran tari, dan musik Latino yang bersemangat untuk dinikmati semua orang.

Tentu saja Ballistic Brewing Co akan menyajikan bir yang lezat (dan bahkan bir cabai!) ditambah mereka akan menyajikan beberapa koktail pedas (dan biasa) sepanjang hari dan malam.

Temukan Hellfire Alley, dan nikmati dua tantangan lagi di panggung utama.

Kesenangan untuk seluruh keluarga dengan anak-anak yang juga dilayani - tempat penitipan hewan, zona kerajinan anak-anak.

Apakah mereka menyebutkan makanan lezat? Mereka akan menyediakan berbagai truk makanan manis dan gurih serta pedagang di lokasi selama dua hari. 

Tiket Masuk Satu Hari atau Dua Hari Tersedia, dengan atau tanpa opsi tiket Fiesta. 

Tiket terhangat di Brisbane diselenggarakan oleh My Chilli Festival di Ballistic Brewing Co, Salisbury.

Deux journes de folie au piment !

Dcouvrez Hellfire Alley : un voyage  travers les pices et les saveurs allchantes des diffrents stands d'exposants et rejoignez les concurrents qui se disputeront la couronne lors de trois dfis piments sur scne.

Musique live tout au long de la journe par le fantastique Sean Mullen  la guitare, et apparition spciale de Sandra Beynon, chanteuse.

Fiesta Salsa pice.
Animations live par un groupe sud-amricain, dmonstration de danse, cours de danse et musique latino entranante pour le plaisir de tous.

Bien sr, la brasserie Ballistic Brewing Co servira d'excellentes bires (et mme une bire pimente !) ainsi que des cocktails pics (et simples) tout au long de la journe et de la soire.

Dcouvrez Hellfire Alley et participez  deux autres dfis sur scne.

Du plaisir pour toute la famille, avec des enfants galement prsents : garderie d'animaux, espace bricolage.

On vous a parl de nourriture dlicieuse ? Ils proposeront une gamme de food trucks et de vendeurs sucrs et sals sur place pendant les deux jours.

Pass un ou deux jours disponibles, avec ou sans option de billet Fiesta.

Le festival le plus en vogue de Brisbane est organis par My Chilli Festival  Ballistic Brewing Co, Salisbury.

_source.productDescription:
Nationally acclaimed singer-songwriter Tom Curtain is again hitting the road, touring his national award-winning outback show 'Katherine Outback Experience' and live music event with fellow singer songwriters Laura Frank, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray. 

The family-friendly event includes an hour Katherine Outback Experience show of real horse training and working dog demonstrations including hands-on fun for the kids. Two hours of live music by Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray.

Tom is passionate about bringing his show to towns and communities that are often overlooked on the entertainment trail. He is also an official ambassador of Dollys Dream and Farm Angels.

productComments.commentText:
Nationally acclaimed singer-songwriter Tom Curtain is again hitting the road, touring his national award-winning outback show 'Katherine Outback Experience' and live music event with fellow singer songwriters Laura Frank, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray. 

The family-friendly event includes an hour Katherine Outback Experience show of real horse training and working dog demonstrations including hands-on fun for the kids. Two hours of live music by Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray.

Tom is passionate about bringing his show to towns and communities that are often overlooked on the entertainment trail. He is also an official ambassador of Dollys Dream and Farm Angels.

(Tom Curtain) (Katherine Outback Experience)  (Laura Frank) (Chris Matthews)  (Melanie Gray) 



(Dollys Dream) (Farm Angels)

Der landesweit gefeierte Singer-Songwriter Tom Curtain ist wieder auf Tournee und prsentiert seine preisgekrnte Outback-Show Katherine Outback Experience sowie ein Live-Musik-Event mit den Singer-Songwriter-Kollegen Laura Frank, Chris Matthews und Melanie Gray.

Die familienfreundliche Veranstaltung umfasst eine einstndige Show im Rahmen der Katherine Outback Experience mit echtem Pferdetraining und Arbeitshundevorfhrungen, inklusive interaktivem Spa fr Kinder. Zwei Stunden Live-Musik von Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews und Melanie Gray.

Tom bringt seine Show leidenschaftlich gerne in Stdte und Gemeinden, die im Unterhaltungsangebot oft bersehen werden. Er ist auerdem offizieller Botschafter von Dollys Dream und Farm Angels.

Penyanyi-penulis lagu ternama nasional, Tom Curtain, kembali tur, menggelar pertunjukan peraih penghargaan nasionalnya di pedalaman, 'Katherine Outback Experience', dan acara musik live bersama rekan-rekan penyanyi dan penulis lagunya, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews, dan Melanie Gray.

Acara ramah keluarga ini mencakup pertunjukan Katherine Outback Experience selama satu jam, yang menampilkan pelatihan kuda sungguhan dan demonstrasi anjing pekerja, termasuk keseruan langsung untuk anak-anak. Dua jam musik live akan dibawakan oleh Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews, dan Melanie Gray.

Tom sangat antusias untuk membawa pertunjukannya ke kota-kota dan komunitas yang seringkali terabaikan dalam dunia hiburan. Ia juga merupakan duta resmi Dollys Dream dan Farm Angels.

El cantautor aclamado a nivel nacional Tom Curtain regresa a la carretera con su galardonado espectculo "Katherine Outback Experience", un evento musical en vivo con sus colegas cantautores Laura Frank, Chris Matthews y Melanie Gray.

El evento familiar incluye una hora de espectculo "Katherine Outback Experience", con entrenamiento ecuestre real y demostraciones de perros de trabajo, incluyendo diversin prctica para los nios. Dos horas de msica en vivo a cargo de Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews y Melanie Gray.

A Tom le apasiona llevar su espectculo a pueblos y comunidades que a menudo pasan desapercibidos en el mundo del entretenimiento. Tambin es embajador oficial de Dollys Dream y Farm Angels.

Il cantautore di fama nazionale Tom Curtain  di nuovo in tourne con il suo spettacolo nell'outback, vincitore di un premio nazionale "Katherine Outback Experience", e un evento musicale dal vivo con i cantautori Laura Frank, Chris Matthews e Melanie Gray.

L'evento, adatto alle famiglie, include un'ora di spettacolo "Katherine Outback Experience", con addestramento di cavalli e dimostrazioni di cani da lavoro, oltre a momenti di divertimento per i bambini. Due ore di musica dal vivo con Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews e Melanie Gray.

Tom porta con passione il suo spettacolo in citt e comunit spesso trascurate nel panorama dell'intrattenimento.  anche ambasciatore ufficiale di Dollys Dream e Farm Angels.

O cantor e compositor aclamado nacionalmente, Tom Curtain, est novamente na estrada, em turn com seu premiado show no outback "Katherine Outback Experience", alm de um evento de msica ao vivo com os colegas cantores e compositores Laura Frank, Chris Matthews e Melanie Gray.

O evento para toda a famlia inclui um show de uma hora no Katherine Outback Experience, com treinamento real de cavalos e demonstraes de ces de trabalho, alm de diverso prtica para as crianas. Duas horas de msica ao vivo com Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews e Melanie Gray.

Tom  apaixonado por levar seu show a cidades e comunidades que muitas vezes so esquecidas no circuito do entretenimento. Ele tambm  embaixador oficial da Dollys Dream e da Farm Angels.

L'auteur-compositeur-interprte de renomme nationale Tom Curtain reprend la route pour prsenter son spectacle prim Katherine Outback Experience et un concert en direct avec ses collgues auteurs-compositeurs-interprtes Laura Frank, Chris Matthews et Melanie Gray.

Cet vnement familial comprend une heure de spectacle Katherine Outback Experience avec de vritables dmonstrations de dressage de chevaux et de chiens de travail, avec des activits ludiques pour les enfants. Deux heures de musique live par Tom Curtain, Laura Frank, Chris Matthews et Melanie Gray.

Tom est passionn par l'ide de faire dcouvrir son spectacle aux villes et communauts souvent oublies du monde du divertissement. Il est galement ambassadeur officiel de Dollys Dream et de Farm Angels.

(Tom Curtain) (Katherine Outback Experience)  (Laura Frank) (Chris Matthews)  (Melanie Gray)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)

Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar

Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have lifts with enough space for people using a mobility aid to enter and turn around to use the lift buttons. Buttons are at accessible height.

Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

With New Blues With A Story, Nathan delivers more than a gig. Expect blistering guitar work, rich vocals, and stories that cut throughunexpectedly vulnerable, disarmingly real, and deeply felt.

This is a show that leaves a mark.

productComments.commentText:
Raw but refined from world-class stages to deeply human stories.

A night of blues-rock, captivating stories, and spine-tingling moments.

As seen on ABC's Australian Story, Nathan Cavaleri's life has been anything but ordinaryworld tours at 8, playing with B.B. King, surviving leukemia, and stepping away from fame only to return with more purpose than ever.

With New Blues With A Story, Nathan delivers more than a gig. Expect blistering guitar work, rich vocals, and stories that cut throughunexpectedly vulnerable, disarmingly real, and deeply felt.

This is a show that leaves a mark.

Roh, aber raffiniert  von Weltklasse-Bhnen bis hin zu tiefgrndigen Geschichten.

Eine Nacht voller Blues-Rock, fesselnder Geschichten und gruseliger Momente.

Wie in der ABC-Sendung Australian Story zu sehen war, war Nathan Cavaleris Leben alles andere als gewhnlich  Welttourneen mit 8 Jahren, Auftritte mit B.B. King, Leukmie-berleben und ein Abschied vom Ruhm  nur um zielstrebiger denn je zurckzukehren.

Mit New Blues With A Story liefert Nathan mehr als nur einen Auftritt. Freut euch auf glhende Gitarrenarbeit, kraftvollen Gesang und Geschichten, die durchdringen  unerwartet verletzlich, entwaffnend real und tief empfunden.

Diese Show hinterlsst Spuren.

Crudo pero refinado desde escenarios de talla mundial hasta historias profundamente humanas.

Una noche de blues-rock, historias cautivadoras y momentos escalofriantes.

Como se vio en Australian Story de ABC, la vida de Nathan Cavaleri ha sido todo menos ordinaria: giras mundiales a los 8 aos, tocar con B.B. King, sobrevivir a la leucemia y alejarse de la fama solo para regresar con ms propsito que nunca.

Con New Blues With A Story, Nathan ofrece mucho ms que un concierto. Espera un trabajo de guitarra fulgurante, voces ricas e historias impactantes: inesperadamente vulnerables, cautivadoramente reales y profundamente sentidas.

Este es un espectculo que deja huella.

Brut mais raffin des scnes de renomme mondiale aux histoires profondment humaines.

Une soire de blues-rock, d'histoires captivantes et de moments  couper le souffle.

Comme on l'a vu dans l'mission Australian Story sur ABC, la vie de Nathan Cavaleri a t tout sauf ordinaire: des tournes mondiales  8ans, des concerts avec B.B. King, une leucmie surmonte, et un loignement de la clbrit pour finalement revenir avec plus de dtermination que jamais.

Avec New Blues With A Story, Nathan offre bien plus qu'un simple concert. Attendez-vous  un jeu de guitare percutant  une voix riche et  des histoires poignantes: d'une vulnrabilit inattendue, d'un ralisme dsarmant et d'une profonde motion.

Un spectacle qui marque les esprits.

Crudo ma raffinato... da palchi di fama mondiale a storie profondamente umane.

Una serata di blues-rock, storie avvincenti e momenti da brivido.

Come visto in Australian Story della ABC, la vita di Nathan Cavaleri  stata tutt'altro che ordinaria: tour mondiali a 8 anni, suonare con B.B. King, sopravvivere alla leucemia e allontanarsi dalla fama... solo per tornare con pi determinazione che mai.

Con "New Blues With A Story", Nathan offre pi di un semplice concerto. Aspettatevi un lavoro di chitarra bruciante, una voce ricca e storie che lasciano il segno: inaspettatamente vulnerabili, disarmantemente reali e profondamente sentite.

Questo  uno spettacolo che lascia il segno.

Mentah namun berkelas dari panggung kelas dunia hingga kisah-kisah yang sangat manusiawi.

Malam yang dipenuhi blues-rock, kisah-kisah memikat, dan momen-momen yang menggetarkan.

Seperti yang terlihat di Australian Story di ABC, kehidupan Nathan Cavaleri sama sekali tidak biasatur dunia di usia 8 tahun, bermain bersama B.B. King, berjuang melawan leukemia, dan menjauh dari ketenaran hanya untuk kembali dengan tujuan yang lebih besar dari sebelumnya.

Dengan New Blues With A Story, Nathan memberikan lebih dari sekadar pertunjukan. Nantikan permainan gitar yang memukau, vokal yang kaya, dan kisah-kisah yang menyentuh hatitanpa diduga rapuh, begitu nyata, dan terasa begitu dalam.

Ini adalah pertunjukan yang meninggalkan jejak.

Cru, mas refinado de palcos de classe mundial a histrias profundamente humanas.

Uma noite de blues-rock, histrias cativantes e momentos de arrepiar.

Como visto no Australian Story da ABC, a vida de Nathan Cavaleri tem sido tudo menos comum  turns mundiais aos 8 anos, tocar com B.B. King, sobreviver  leucemia e se afastar da fama apenas para retornar com mais propsito do que nunca.

Com New Blues With A Story, Nathan entrega mais do que um show. Espere um trabalho de guitarra arrebatador, vocais ricos e histrias marcantes  inesperadamente vulnerveis, surpreendentemente reais e profundamente tocantes.

Este  um show que deixa marcas.

_source.productName: 2025 First Set GromQuest pres. by We Are Feel Good Inc.
_source.productDescription:
Surfing Queensland is excited to announce the 2025 First Set GromQuest pres. by We Are Feel Good Inc. surf competition, taking place on the Sunshine Coast from 1-2 November.

This epic 3,500 rated event will showcase the next generation of surfing talent, with divisions ranging from Under 10 through to Under 18.

New to 2025, the competition will also feature the Big Kids Cup. A mixed opens division for all to join in on the fun!

The 2025 First Set GromQuest pres. by We Are Feel Good Inc. promises two days of action-packed surfing and is an event you won't want to miss!
